# Quickstarts Docs

> Get started quickly with AI in .NET using templates and minimal code samples. Quickstarts cover chat completions, embeddings, and RAG patterns with Azure OpenAI, OpenAI, and GitHub Models. Use the .NET AI app templates for streamlined project setup.

- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/ai-templates.md): Create a .NET AI app to chat with custom data using the AI app template extensions and the Microsoft.Extensions.AI libraries
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/build-chat-app.md): Create a simple AI powered chat app using Microsoft.Extensions.AI and the OpenAI or Azure OpenAI SDKs
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/build-mcp-client.md): Learn to create a minimal MCP client and connect it to an MCP server using .NET
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/build-mcp-server.md): Learn to create and connect to a minimal MCP server using C# and publish it to NuGet.
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/build-vector-search-app.md): Create an AI powered app to search and integrate with vector stores using embeddings and the Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData package for .NET
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/chat-local-model.md): Set up a local AI model and chat with it using a .NET console app and the Microsoft.Extensions.AI libraries
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/create-assistant.md): Learn to create a minimal AI assistant with tooling capabilities using .NET and the Azure OpenAI SDK libraries
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/generate-images.md): Create a simple app using to generate images using OpenAI.Images.ImageClient in .NET.
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/prompt-model.md): Create a simple chat app using Microsoft.Extensions.AI to summarize a text.
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/publish-mcp-registry.md): Learn how to publish your NuGet-based MCP server to the Official MCP Registry, including creating a server.json manifest, updating your package README, and using the MCP Publisher tool.
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/structured-output.md): Learn how to create a chat app that responds with structured output, that is, output that conforms to a type that you specify.
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/text-to-image.md): Learn how to use Microsoft.Extensions.AI to generate images from text prompts using AI models in a .NET application.
- [Quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/quickstarts/use-function-calling.md): Create a simple chat app using OpenAI and extend the model to execute a local function.
